author: Holly Otterbein
title: Does Bernie have a path to victory? Even top aides aren’t sure anymore.
description: Some in Sanders’ inner circle have advised him to consider dropping out.
content: Sanders' campaign manager, Faiz Shakir, and senior adviser, Jeff Weaver, have likewise declined to answer questions from POLITICO about what his path looks like. While its not yet mathematically impossible for him to win,Sanders would need to amass more than … [+6600 chars]
